caller_intent: Jasmine is seeking a homeowners insurance quote for a new home she is closing on, potentially as a bundle with her existing Progressive policy. She wants to explore options and understand coverage requirements.
resolution_steps: Agent Maria Bowman confirmed Jasmine's home closing date and reason for the call.
Collected detailed property information: single-family residence (2020, 2,850 sq ft, vinyl siding with stone, 3-car garage, no basement, slab foundation, 2 stories, central heating/AC).
Asked about financing (cash purchase), home value ($500k), appraisal status, and property address (2484 Mossy Meadow Trail, Kernersville, NC 27284).
Noted need to run a replacement cost estimator for accurate dwelling coverage.
knowledge_required: Property-specific risk factors (e.g., foundation type, exterior materials)
Insurance bundling options with existing carriers
summary: Maria Bowman is assisting Jasmine with a homeowners insurance quote for a new 2,850 sq ft single-family home in Forsyth County. The agent has gathered key property details and will use a replacement cost estimator to determine appropriate coverage. The call is ongoing with follow-up needed for appraisal value confirmation.
